page.title: 09LIFE STYLE
page.content: A typical family. My name is Alan Hudson and I am eleven years old. I have a brother, Mark, aged nine years. We live with my Mum and Dad in our own house. My house has eight rooms, kitchen, front room, living room downstairs and three bedrooms, toilet and bathroom upstairs. We have three television sets, one in the living room, one in the front room and I have one in my bedroom. There is suitable furniture in each room. We have a nice garden with a pond in it (with frogs), a greenhouse with lots of plants. We have a lawn with flower beds round it, and at the bottom of the garden we have a shed in which we keep tools and odd things.
